messages: Mark took Nina out and introduced her to a therapist.
Brad might be a ditz, but he's not such a bad guy. Thanks to him, Nina's been smiling more and more
Plus, Nina's been helping him remember his phone, wallet, and other valuables so he's not as hopeless.
I shouldn't be surprised, but they seem happy together.
More importantly, Nina's back to her old self again.
Therapy helped her a bunch and now she's been mending her relationships with the people she pushed away.
...I feel like my work here is done. I had a feeling there was a reason I came back after a year.
There's no need to stick around any more.
